titles.title: Low in The Grave He Lay

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Low in the grave he lay,
Jesus, my Saviour,
Waiting the coming day,
Jesus, my Lord:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Up from the grave He arose,
With a mighty triumph oâ€™er His foes;
He arose a Victor from the dark domain,
And He lives for ever with His saints to reign:
He arose! He arose!
Alleluia! Christ arose!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Vainly they watch His bed,
Jesus, my Saviour;
Vainly they seal the dead,
Jesus, my Lord:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Death cannot keep his prey,
Jesus, my Saviour;
He tore the bars away,
Jesus, my Lord:
